docs.text: Problems with anchor tracking in tables I use a custom hook to insert anchors into the TOC referring to elements within a <table> . Unfortunately, anchor tracking brakes and I do not get valid behaviour of the TOC in the nav bar on the left side. See for yourself, please. :) This is a normal <h2> heading As this is a normal markdown-generated heading, everything is working as it should when it comes to tracking the currently viewed section. As you could see, having anchors within the table breaks the tracking completly. "But maybe this is only due to the links being added via a hook? Or because they are <strong> elements and not headings?" I hear you say. Well, these are valid questions I asked myself too. So to see if any of this is the case, here I present you with two more custom anchors. This time outside of any table. Let's see how they behave.
